item.title: Mute and Unmute commands!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

search in your client for “int silent” w/o the quotes. If it isn’t there, add it. and make it write to the character file, so that they’re muted for more than just the time they’re logged in.

Read full topic

item.title: Mute and Unmute commands!
item.dc:creator: @madmanisbad2 madmanisbad2
item.description:
@madmanisbad2 wrote:

I put these commands in and i got 3 errors?

anything i should do to fix or can u send me a mute and unmute command?

f (command.startsWith(“mute”)) {
try {
String mutedName = command.substring(5);
int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName);
client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer];
m.silent = 1;
sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted");
m.sendMessage(“A member of staff has permanently muted you”);
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute”);
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“unmute”)) {
try {
String muted = command.substring(7);
int playerMuted = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted);
client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerMuted];
m.silent = 0;
m.tempmute = 0;
m.sendMessage(“A member of staff has lifted your mute, allowing you to talk again”);
sendMessage(muted+" is no longer permanently muted");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want to unmute”);
}
}
and the errors are…

client.java:10838: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable silent
location: class client
m.silent = 1;

client.java:10838: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable silent
location: class client
m.silent = 0;

client.java:10838: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable tempmute
location: class client
m.tempmute = 1;

what should i do?

Read full topic
